item.title: Updates on Speakers
item.dc:creator: Addie Wagenknecht
item.description: Unfortunately we have to announce that David Lang will not be able to speak at Open Hardware Summit this year due to a personal conflict, instead David Cuartielles, Arduino Co-Founder […]
item.content:encoded:
Unfortunately we have to announce that David Lang will not be able to speak at Open Hardware Summit this year due to a personal conflict, instead David Cuartielles, Arduino Co-Founder and a well known member of the Open Hardware community will join us in the opening remarks! Woot!

Important notice: please be aware that you’ll need to print your ticket as we will need this to speed up the check in process. The Auditorium will recycle all the paper used for tickets.

PS: did you see our post on what will be going on on day 2 and how to reach the venue?
